typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	sql_query as string,
	qc_id as integer,
	pipeline_name as string,
	pkey_column as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($sql_query),
	format: 'query') ~> QCTable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: (concat('select', toString($qc_id) , ', count(1) from', '( ',$sql_query, ' ) group by ', toString($qc_id) )\n\n\n),
	format: 'query') ~> source1
QCTable derive(sql_query = $sql_query,
		qc_id = $qc_id,
		pipeline_name = $pipeline_name,
		pkey_column_values = toString(byName($pkey_column))) ~> TestQuery
source1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
TestQuery sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Code as string,
		Grouping as string,
		Classification as string,
		Specialization as string,
		Definition as string,
		{Effective Date} as string,
		{Deactivation Date} as string,
		{Last Modified Date} as string,
		Notes as string,
		{Display Name} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['test_loop_sql_out.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
